API_Description: Adds an invisible timestamp to a document.

oSig.description: (optional) The signature engine object. If this parameter is not specified, the default (internal) signature engine is used.

cDIPath.description: (optional) The file path for saving the signed file. If this parameter is not specified, the file is saved over itself.

bUI.description: (optional) Set TRUE to enable UI interaction. May be FALSE if a path is supplied. The default is FALSE.
